content.detailedDescription:
After work at around 7:30 i went to get mail on goldenrod way in harvest hills subdivision. it was already totally dark and as i was walking back to the house i looked up at aircraft ( as i often do, because i'm a pilot ) and observed an aircraft that appeared to be on ils approach to slc runway 34r but it was a bit too far to the right of where the localizer should be. i then started turning in a slow turn to the right until it was going over the wasatch mountain or pretty close ( about over pleasant grove ) in a more southerly or southeasterly direction. i saw one white strobe and several unblinking white lights but was unable to discern a shape to it. but it looked about as big and the passenger jets that fly the approach. 

landing from the south is the norm for kslc unless the wind dictates otherwise, so i see a large number of large transport category aircraft over my house all the time. 

strange thing was i saw no nav lights or rotating red beacons. i'm very familiar with the proper light config for normal aircraft and helos. larger transports normally have a red rotating beacon on the belly of the plane and one on top and smaller aircraft usually have one only on the top of the vert stab. i thought that only one white strobe was not by itself unusual because strobes burn out all the time. but no red and green navs lights and no beacons struck me as strange. 

and here's the crazy part. i was so struck by the unusual lights that i went upstairs and turned on my handheld uniden scanner and selected only the two frequency banks that have about 130 local aircraft frequencies programmed. i shut out ham and emergency freqs. because i wanted to hear what ( if anything ) was going on with this unusual aircraft.

heard in the next half hour two very strange exchanges between pilots and approach controller:

1. approach controller asking airline pilot to describe the lights on something. caught only part of the this exchange.

2. about 15 minutes later heard pilot asking approach controller if they had "it" on radar. whatever "it" was. controll answered that they thought they had it. then scanner scanned through again and i did not catch any more of that exchange. 

as a pilot very knowledgeable of the aircraft lights, procedures and the type of things normally said over the radio, i thought the entire experience strange from start to finish. the fact that i went in to listen to the aircraft freqs after seeing it should tell you something. to an average person, this would only appear as a normal aircraft because most people are not knowledgeable about the standard lighting on aircraft.
content.summary: Non-standard aircraft lights w/subsequent approach control/pilot interactions

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on patio relaxing as i usually did on a warm, clear night looking for shooting stars or satellites to pass the time when this unknown object appeared moving fairly quickly from the north east to south west. it was rectangular in shape comprised of a series of dots all evenly apart, probably about 12 by 4 in shape. they weren't blinking. there was not outline around the dots. i have never seen anything like it and have never seen it again. was too high and too evenly spaced to be geese or other formation of migrating birds. it left me awed and wondering about what it was. i have never heard of any other person reporting such a thing. would love to know what it might have been.
 on another occasion several years ago i did see what i thought were ufos. i was in a small private plane of approach to reno, nv when i noticed what looked like two cars with headlights going around a mountain. i asked the pilot what mountain that as he told me there is no mountain  out there. then just as quickly as they appeared they shot skyward disappeared. i asked the pilot if he had seen them. he said yes and i have seen others like it in my years of flying.
content.summary: A rectangular object made up of a series of lights evenly spaced

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up too early that day (2014), it was 5am so i took a cofee and went to
the back yard to smoke a cigarrete. as t was not my first sighting i was looking the sky and then i saw the bright light star like coming from ne and making a strange movement like a snake (zig zag we say). i called my wife and it lasted enough to make her see and agree it was an ufo.

i had an experience before, about 17 years ago when i saw a shoe box shaped with a light on the inner side in a place called algodoal which
is a small fishing village and there was another witness with me. the
object came toward us (it was llate night) and all of sudden turned
its interest to a window of a very poor house and started to make square movements up and down fm side to side and when i asked the other person after long 2 minutes if he coud see what i was seeing he replied affimatively and we started to run and i ran so much that i could feel my heel in my butt... my whole father family had an encounter during daylight also in the 70Â´s
content.summary: A brighty light in a zig zag movement about 50 mtrs high in my backyard

content.detailedDescription:
[name removed/cms/tg] (age 25) upon returning home from picking up food, got out of car (facing east) and noticed two formations of 4 red objects each in the se  got to driveway and started videoing the objects.  [name removed/cms/tg] who was a passenger in the car also saw the objects after they were pointed out.  she too started videoing the objects alongside.  both videod the objects with smart phones from approximately 5 feet apart.  objects were shot over the house next door to the east.  the objects throughout the sighting were at an elevation of approximately 30degrees (measured by a sextent on this date by [name removed/cms/tg]).  after the initial sighting from the driveway, both observers entered the home and looked out the back door to the deck off of the dining area.  from their the observers went up stairs to the balcony off of the master bedreoom however objects were still somewhat obscured because of trees.  lastly both observers went downstairs and exited the house and headed east on white street to get a better vantage point.  by the time they approached the intersection of white street and church street, the objects had disappeared.  the formations were roughly boxlike.  when originally sighted immediately thought that these were ufos.

it should be noted that the objects first appeared as two separate formations of 4 objects each.  they eventually move towards one another until they for all intents and purposes merged into one formation that was staggered in a www configuration.  entire sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes.  the objects showed steady red lights about the size of a pencil eraser held at arms length.  the lights were solid red with the exception of one that did pulse slightly and briefly.  objects were believed to be offshore being that observer #1 lived at the subject property and that property was roughly 3 blocks to the oeean (seven presidents park).

witness #2 (video #2) is [name removed/cms/tg] (age 26).
content.summary: 8 red objects sighted in se moving in two formations heading ne direction

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard bbqing and saw the light from the east coming down and pulsing.  usually the police helicopter has a red flashing light so i thought that was what i was seeing.  i looked further and saw that the red was not a red of normal color.  very bright red, not a color easy to describe but red deep red pulsing.  it came towards my house and made no noise.  moved to my right pulsing and no noise, then suddenly took off and disappeared.  i am familiar with chinese lanterns, not what this was, police helicopter, not what this was.  i have seen this on 2 other occasions same area and every time the next day two fighter just patrol the area.  i am next to seal beach nuclear storage.  i am familiar with a flight patch of two wart hog jets usually about twice a month, but this time i put it together that they are seen after a sighting.  maybe military drones or maybe et's.  i dont know.
content.summary: Red light from east pulsing and heading towards me descending then moved to the rightpulsing then ascednded, tookm off and gone!

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my girlfriend to her car and as soon as we stepped outside we saw a bright blue light in the north/ north west part of the sky. at first we thoughy it was a star or a helicopter but we soon realized that is was neither.  the arial movments it was making was unlike any modern craft known. it would move up then down then side to side and diagonally.  we watched it for a good 2 min before i rushed inside and got my brother so we could have more witnesses. we all watched it for another 5min at that point it blinked off and my mother came out. then it came back and then was pulsing soon after it pulsed it zoomed off. i was shaking from the adrenaline.  and we all felt scared and confused.
content.summary: Blue light that quickly changed direction and speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday morning, june 2, 2013, some time between 2 and 4 am,i was working late into the morning on my computer when the power went down.  i looked out of my office window to see if the rest of the neighborhood had been affected by the power outage. it had. and the entire area had become very dark.  there were no stars visible through the window so i assume there was cloud cover. 

almost immediately i observed lights coming over the hilltop just north of my home.  they were flying low so i thought at first it was a helicopter.   they were configured in a circle, 12 to 15 oval shaped lights that emitted a bright, slightly green, mostly "pale" yellow light.  they were bright but not glaring. as the object advanced toward my home i looked up as it began to pass over the trees in my front yard.  i estimate the diameter of the circle to be at least 100 ft. wide.  i could not see any outline beyond the circle of lights, but by the way they moved together and also rotated slowly around a common center i had the distinct impression that they were attached to something much bigger that was not visible in the darkness. it made no sound as it passed over. 

the individual lights were a kind of "square oval" shape and appeared to also have a low domed profile.  the object was moving from the north to the south in a line directly over my house. as i saw it pass directly over my roof at perhaps 100 to 500 ft altitude i was already thinking how i would get through the darkness to the south deck on my house. i knew i had a flashlight in my bedroom, so i attempted to grope my way through the profound darkness that now filled my house, find my flashlight, and try to observe the object as it continued on its due south flight path. however, i became disoriented in the darkness and ended up fumbling in my office closet thinking that i was in the hallway.  by the time i found my way to the bedroom and found my flashlight and came out on the deck, the object was no where in sight.  so i do no know which direction it departed in.  i did notice that the night was "unusual" in various ways beside the power and lights being out.  there was a vague reddish hue in the night sky, no stars or moon, a slight balmy breeze, but the air was almost visible as if it were a liquid.  i was of course excited, but i didn't feel any fear or dread.  i did feel exhilarated....It was quite an experience.  power returned about two hours later.
content.summary: A circle of 12 to 15 pale yellow-green lights travling north to south over my house after electricity went down in the middle of the night.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving with friends to go to a party, i was at the right side of a passenger window, and i noticed a big dipper like pattern within stars, so i started to stare at them, suddenly, a small flash of light appeared and it slowed down to where i could see it as some sort of flying object, it had 1 wing at the top, curved shape, and two of the same at the side. it appeared to be white with black windows or some sort of structure, and sud+.3+denly it picked up speed, and was out of sight within fractions of a second. the entire duration of how i saw it was about 4 seconds, and i asked my friend next to me if he saw it, and when he was asking questions i was baffled because i know what i had seen.
content.summary: Had 1 wing at top, 2 at side, and suddenly showed, flew for a brief second, then blasted off to where i could not see it any longer.

content.detailedDescription: Sky watching at 2049 pacific time, i was facing west at a 42 degree angle, when i observed a glowing object traveling in the sky from the west and heading east, it was yellow-orange in color and was basically spherical in shape with a teardrop feature pointing towards the earth. it caught my eye especially because it was approaching my location. the light that was consistently emanated from the object had a glowing radiant appearance. it took only a moment to de-materialize with a simultaneous last second change in direction to the south, southeast. there was no breeze or wind, temperature was 67 degrees. please note that the object traveled in essentially a straight course with slight fluctuations, similar to the flight pattern of a butterfly. i hastily struggled to grab and point my video camera in the objects direction, regretfully unable to videotape or photograph the event. i am south of long beach airport, where most landing/take-offs can be hear and observed.
content.summary: Yellow-orange glowing orb observed approaching from west to east 8:49pm glowing teardrop shape de-materialized after 45 seconds of observation

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on empire rd east to west at about 7:50pm in lafayette colorado and i saw a strange object with green lights and one red/orange light flying slowly from my right to my left in the distance (short). it was flying at a very low elevation close to the rooftops of the houses. it then changed direction and came straight towards me. i thought it was going to crash into me but at the last second it ascended and flew over my car. very frightening situation. no other cars were on the road at the time.
content.summary: Object with green lights and 1 orange light flew towards my car and flew over me

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 715 pm for a cigarette, i'm sitting outside my back door when i see a plane. i watch the plane fly for 30 secs to be distracted by what looked like a flying star. solid light but you could tell it was outside earths atmosphere. it was moving east at a very slow rate, maybe 15Â° in 30 secs. made a sudden 90Â° turn, stopped. made a circle, stopped again. tried calling my sister twice, she didnt answer. the ufo did another circle and started heading northeast turned and heading northwest before i ran inside to show my mother. take her outside to see the ufo moved north to behind the pine trees only to show up after she went inside. stayed right next to the pines for 20 mins going in circles and back and forth all cardinal directions. i went on my facebook to message my nephew to go and see it. he ran outside, he looked east and also watched it for awhile. stayed in the same spot but moved with the stars while doing small circles for about another 30 mins. at around 8:20pm i went to grab another cigarette and my mom came out again to confirm what i saw. she watched it with me for 3 mins and went inside. i went inside for an hour and when i came back out it was still there. i went inside again and called it a night.
content.summary: Would go all sorts of different directions but mostly north

content.detailedDescription: This occurrence was many years ago (1969 or 1970) spring, in hammond indiana, about 30 miles from chicago.  i was always amazed that there was nothing reported in the newspapers.  while traveling with a companion around dusk, had just exited (northwest indiana) interstate 80-94 on kennedy ave. looked up and saw large disk/circular object with rotating colored lights hovering over apartment complex next to the major interstate. we pulled over to the side of the shoulder to watch and at least 20 other vehicles were already pulled off to the side of the road also watching.  there was no noise coming from it, it was high but could see windows and the lights in color rotating from outer perimeter underside.  my companion and i just sat there watching for a least twenty, minutes (this was before cell phones) as others watching either in their vehicles or outside.  we finally left after about 20 minutes.  other people were still there watching.  we assumed there would be something in our newspaper the next day but there was nothing.  at the time our local papers was either the hammond times or gary tribune. i was literally speechless to see this huge "saucer" and not one word was ever printed about it.
content.summary: Hovered over 80-94 expressway and apartment complex

content.detailedDescription: My wife and myself were out enjoying valentines day out visiting local restaurants when my wife went out to smoke a cigarette. she was outside for around three minutes and returned from outside. she said that there is a light out side that is very weird.  it turned from red to green and appeared to spread out then split into separate lights and came back as one this happened twice over a forty sec span. then it appeared to come toward me and go back again. after hearing this i went outside to see for myself and it was easy to spot. hovering as a bright green dot in the sky facing south just about even with a bright white star in the sky. watching for a time of twenty seconds the light spread out and turned red then turned green switching back and fourth every five seconds. at this time an employee from the restaurant came out to see for himself he witnessed the same thing i saw. twenty seconds later it seemed to float down to the left towards denver and stopped about couple hundred feet in the air. the employee had a customer come in and went back inside. at this point the lights seemed to raise up and move south for a second then shoot up and to the right over the mountains in less than two seconds with no sounds at all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright green dot/ pulsated red and green flat then moved down and to the right/ hovered  for 5 sec and shot up over mountains

content.detailedDescription: Disc shaped object flying horizontal with three beams on yellow light trailing behind it. the light was yellow and there was a yellow light on the object. it disappeared in thin air.
content.summary: Disc shared object with 3 beams of light behind

content.detailedDescription: While stargazing me and my daughter saw a ufo, at first i thought it was just a star but while observing it blinks for every 8 seconds and moves very slow in arc like direction for about three to five minutes and then gone, my daughter also saw this, it was definitely not a plane or a satellite. we are amaze of the sighting.
content.summary: At first i thought it was just a star but while observing it blinks for every 8 seconds and moves very slow in different angles for about three to five minutes and then gone

content.detailedDescription:
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]] (youtube 24 second long video). i was apprehensive as the craft in question drew near and over passed my location.Under some filters ,brightness,strength etc...(of a video still image and zooming in...) seems to be a " figure  "seems to stand at a window or doorway....Some 20 people exclaimed " oh yeah,i see it !"...Police officers included. the image is off center in the "white diamond light "....It starts as a speck but,you have only to zoom in to see the anomaly within the anomaly. file 13-1.Jpg is the unfiltered photo of the craft. 
file 2~2 is the anomaly. (filtered) .
under filtering the "starship ufo starship" becomes more apparent. 
more photos ensue...(closeups etc...)
notice "blank spaces and brightness variations in its !"fuselage" or "nose" area.The craft traveled to the right .Notice the "corners "of the white diamond light..."trim" or "frame" around the "white diamond light"...Notice things etc...
notice the "zig zag " in the "laser beam",way down....Notice things....Notice its camouflage. ...It fools you...It looks like nothing but a "light"...Like a star.Jet has to have a "record" at the time,check for it...
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Other, Unknown
content.summary: Star like object traveling low and slow emitting a brown colored gamma-ray beam downward with an accompanying green/purple haze around the object.

content.detailedDescription: I awoke at 5:20am and turned on my computer and my outdoor security camera immediately sounded an alarm.  a large bright plasma ball about 3 feet in diameter was fluctuating just outside the back door above the driveway to the north.  the plasma ball fluctuated in height and length to about 8 feet.  i went outside to see it and it was completely invisible to the naked eye, however it appeared on my infrared security camera.  it cast dark shadow on the ground which fluctuated in conjunction with its movement.  it remain visible on video for one hour until sunrise, and when my camera changed from infra-red to color, the object appeared as thousands of black pixels flashing against the now colored background including pixel shadow on the ground and then disappeared.  there were two witnesses who saw my video recording the following day.  i was not afraid, but the experience has changed my life forever.  i found myself unable to think of anything else for over a week. i feel that it was a "plasma entity" and made itself visible and known to me for some unknown reason.  similar smaller fluctuating plasma entities have been captured on my infra-red video cameras since and have been viewed by other family members.  i was the single witness to the actual event, however multiple people have viewed my infra-red video security camera footage.  original video was accidentally lost, but witnesses can confirm the event.  i would like to be interviewed in person and will show other infrared video i have of smaller plasma entities that visited on october 12, 2014.
content.summary: Bright plasma ball about 3 feet high fluctuating to 8 feet long caught on infra-red security camera

content.detailedDescription:
Was on my deck looking at stars. 11.50pm


see them a lot. at high altitude 6k ft. so we see very clearly up here. 

a "blinky" ufo. 

jittering and changing colors while vibrating slightly. 

amazed. a little concerned, but not scared. 

didn't lose sight. still viewing it's 12.23 now. see them a lot for hrs at a time. only watched one actually fly off behind the mountain up here.
content.summary: Pulsing bright lights that change colors and

content.detailedDescription:
I have just posted something on your facebook page but was only able to post a couple of pics i will try here i noticed that about that my post duplicated itself sorry.  i made a discovery something so unbelievable in actuality only one word can describe it that is a miracle. i truly think that because of what i discovered is why these flying saucers showed up. what i found is very small sony camcorders have a strong zoom as i was filming part of a fence i must have brushed up against them they flew out of the wood in a orb shape when they were about 2 feet away they changed into small flying saucers mind you i thought they were bugs but when i looked at the pics i saw that they weren't. i have had 5 encounters with them 3 yes i saw them hovering above my head. i know that they are observing my every move because of what i have found they have compromised over 300,000 pics 100s of hours of video. i won't go into detail about what i have found because every time i i tell someone what it is there minds close up and they look away.
 other people have seen them and some of them have been put away.The difference is i have proof beyond a reasonable doubt please i need help on my fathers and brothers graves what i have found might be one of the greatest discoveries ever made i have left a couple of phone numbers on facebook of people who can verify my story i have used facebook as somewhat of a journal the whole story is there with hundreds of pics please take the time to look at what i have my phone number is (removed phone number place in contact information cak)  this is the third time that i have tried to submit this form hopefully they will let me post some pics going this way now i know that this is pretty far out there all the pics are real if you look close at the saucers not the white ones(the blue in the pics deteriorates the pics meaning compromised). i just figured out that they are not flying saucers they are helmets with these strange looking guys heads in them you can see them in the pics where you can see a figure with the helmets on there heads have i lost you yet.  now the pic with the alien lady you have to look close she's watching these monsters destroying the wood trying to get at what i discovered there are two pics of the monsters them selves look close you will see a little person he has a duckbill sort of face being hauled away and a female trying to hold him back. please i hope i haven't chased you away for 2 years now i have seen things right out of a scifi movie. i know way way to much why i am still here i don't know. you must at least talk to me as you can see writer i am not i will not let you down so much more to tell you
content.summary: Was taking pics of something i discovered they came out of the wood flew around my head than flew back towards the fence thought they were bugs i checked the pics and saw about 50 small flying saucers

content.detailedDescription: We had family visiting and it got late so i walked them out to their car. i have a habit of always looking up to the sky whenever i step out so as i always do, i looked up to the sky as i walked them out. suddenly a light and movement coming from the north caught my attention. i observed the object and it's movement and realized it was not a plane nor helicopter. i could not tell the distance of the object but it was very high in the sky but big enough to make out what it was. it was a cloudy night but the object was still visible amongst the clouds. in my excitement i shouted out to my sister, her husband and their son (they were inside the house) to rush outside to see what i had spotted. we all agreed that what we saw something not familiar to us. my sister tried to record it/snap a picture with her cell phone but we couldn't get a clear picture. the object was round in shape, with a large white hazy sphere surrounding it. between the sphere was another round shaped object with a green still light in the middle. surrounding the green light was like a projection of some sort displaying odd green shapes and designs in sequence (it reminded me of tetris). it moved along the sky from north to south until it stopped above us, hovered for a few seconds and suddenly ascended. it ascended for about a minute or so then it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shocking and mysterious

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling with my ex wife northwest in a remote area, sometime between 3-5pm we noticed a glowing brightness in the woods emanating onto the road. 
we were around 100 yards from the area the light was emanating from and i noticed the brightness was emanating from a spot about 50 to 100 feet back into the woods as we neared the light became brighter, as we approached and slowed down the light became so bright i could not see and instinctively shielded my eyes, i felt the heat and impact of the light through the passenger window, the beam of light that was emitted was about 3 to 4 feet in size. my x wife was able to see the object and she describes it as a globe almost like a strobe light about 10 feet in diameter approx 5 to 10 feet off the ground.


being as i grew up and have hunted the area i'm familiar with any roads and camps which are situated in the location. the object was in a group of pine trees, no roads no camps nor can i imagine anyone could have a light which would emit such a light during the daytime.

we were both kinda in shock and kept going, we returned in approximately one hour and did not see anything out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Bright strobe light hovering above ground emitting a beam

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed looking out the window and i saw a group of three or four lights organized horizontally. they had an aura that gave it a saucer shape. the object(s) did not move. right off i suspected this was a ufo. this didn't surprise me since i suspect i'm being apducted. i have no proof
content.summary: Cloudy night, no stars, group of lights, horizontal aura, possible second cluster, 3-4 in main

content.detailedDescription: I was with family about to turn in for the evening. we noticed our dogs outside were barking like they really were scared .We all went out front of our house to see what was going on. in the distance, with no sound at all,we saw four then three lights moving slowly up then down. they were above and below each other. then four combined to three and moved up about two or three hundred feet then back down to about one hundred feet above the ground. one of the lights moved to the right a few feet and became a bit brighter .The dogs then got very quite, the lights started moving up  slowly then in a fraction of a second they picked up speed and were been  gone. at that point we all realized we had been outside several min. and were cold and had been standing there with our mouths open but not saying anything. we did not talk about this after that day .Never saw it again or anything like it. my mother and older brother are gone now so i think i should say something to someone befor i am gone as well. i remember that night from time to time very clearly. that area we lived in was very isolated at that time so i guess we just figured we lived in the boonys.
content.summary: Three of us were alerted by our dogs .We went outside and wached several lights making strange movements for several min.

content.detailedDescription:
Filing this report in reference to the report filed on 02/08/15 for 'orange orbs' observed in oldsmar, fl on 02/07/15. 
 on the previous night of 2/6, i was on the return trip from walking my dog when an intensely bright orange light caught my attention from behind the nearby treeline north of my position. i noted that the light did not have strobes or navigation lights of green/red. just bright orange like a mercury-vapor streetlight with slight red tones at times.
 despite my dog tugging to keep going,i stopped and grabbed the cellphone from my back pocket to snap photos. shoot first, delete later if helicopter photo was my thinking. time was 8:14pm on phone when i got it out. i took a total of 6 photos while object was passing overhead since both sides of street had trees limiting viewing arc. only two 'worthy' pics came out which i uploaded here,unaltered, and a third 'enhanced' photo that i resized/adjusted to make it more like i viewed it versus how the phone saw it. ignore blue dots in photos. i think they're pixelated stars as that night was clear.
object moved quickly, silently in straight path from n to ssw. the old chinese sky lantern explanation here, except that it was moving quickly on a windless night (ground level) and the intensity of the light without flickering made me rule that out. only variance of light i would describe as 'shimmering' from bright to brighter. 
tying this to the oldsmar report is that sighting occurred directly south of both oldsmar, fl and 4.5 miles south of clearwater st pete airport runway 36r. i cannot estimate the objects altitude other than it appeared as high as the planes on approach to the airport when they pass over my house.

Before 10p.M. and the sighting, it looked like dugway was conducting laser test of some kind. all of a sudden a huge cone of light would flash over the valley. no sound. this happened twice before we saw the object. and then again after the object was gone. we looked out over dugway and there was a huge red ball of light. i went running for the camera when my husband said it split into 2. he tried zooming in on object while i watched it split again. then it just disappeared. also have photo's of what look to me to be a cattle mutilation. have video of object but it is not of great quality. also have 2 photo's of cow. it's still out there today on our way home. in the ensign ranch area, west side of the main road to dugway.
content.summary: Huge ball of light that split apart @ least 3 times

content.detailedDescription: Reported to peter davenport.Stepped outside.Saw chopper or jet low approaching in south east. looked west,saw in south west (venus or low hanging star or chopper or jet,later to be the starship ufo---my term. .. ) just a spark.No faa lights, low slowly approaching my grounds.Ran inside.Got smart phone.Waited a couple mins it seemed for it to get in video range.Jet and ufo were gonna hit,collide yet passed one over the other about 1/4 mile away over land to the north west. blink blink ,in white specks, was the jet on my vid screen.Object in question was black or invisible on view screen.Aiming to anticipate it's route, i aimed at the building peak,the object "passed" it.My camera eye was new to me ,mostly, and is off center from my familiarity with camera phones.Mercury light is about the size of a medicine ball and is up about 25-27 feet on the steel buildings side.Peak is about 3 feet higher than merc light. peak is about 5 paces out from standing video location. ..Running west to east for example(the peak). craft was silent.About 1,000 feet off the ground.Speed about 30 mph.Never altered appearance yet traveled.Looked like icicles sticking out like quils (3-4 total).Blinked at it yet,no alteration.Focusing "to it" was painfully difficult and tough.In video i felt awkward i might be preparing to film a chopper or flare/ fire work etc... i stated "naw, i don't have the resolution...However...It's a weird one...This is really not good...It won't come in !" ( pan down to end video in frustration --- mercury light again in left corner....) roof appears bronzy in color...Beam from ship exits on an angle, and , at my vicinity - and is brownish tan as it traveled low slow and clear on video.I "let it go",when video was a "fail"  etc...And "allowed it to travel off" without further pursuit, going north east (rising sun side) in its straight line path....Soon after i called 911.2 sheriffs deputies, 2 cars...2 mins later...During report, i showed the officer a bright light leaving our planet.....I said "do you see that! " he said ,"i see it ."....I said "do you got that !?" he said,"i got it ." and we watched for about 5-7 seconds this venus sized object (as seen from earth with the unaided eye,like a star....) go away from us, clearly,at about 95,000 feet or whatever is high ,high in altitude,near space gravity...At an arms length ,traveling the distance of an open hand--- in six seconds about--- at about a degree , to due north on the sighting location,of 86 going to 87 ....Straight path,then "bam" ....Lights out,like somebody threw a bucket if cold water on it....Or it went into the belly of the mother ship....Or it hit a worm hole or something it just-- bam was out.Gone. we both said "woah!"....Officer said " i never seen anything like that before !"...Other officer stepped out ,"what was that ?!" i said, "saw another ufo ." now i reported to nat.Ufo rep.Ctr in sept time....He,pete,got back after some serious phone tag,lol,to tell me "we don't investigate"...I said "do i try collage labs ?!" he said ,"yea !"....That was jan-feb...Big ol waste a time right...Got a little "traction" with us air force (former) and thier friends with a super computer....They found in feb ....The beam is refracting, repeat refracting....Not that i said reflecting ...Ok....It is 5 (five)feet wide ,ok,in width as it exits the craft in question...Ok they said it is not a dowel or doweling it isn't even a post or wood or steel or a stadium light or street light etc....It is probably  plasma or a tractor beam etc ....Yet,it is 30(thirty) feet wide or in width at some point down away from the ship.The entire craft ,light and all,is in full video view etc....You just zoom in after you pause.Etc...Etc....
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Other, Unknown
content.summary: Cfi) star like object traveling low and slow emitting a brown colored gamma-ray beam downward with an accompanying green/purple haze around the object.

content.detailedDescription: Only lights five for the 7 were probability satellites but two stop over head for a minute  or two. one was going for north to south and the other was going south to north. all were probability  out of our atmosphere.  see two or three  satellites every night and know there time and trac but the two that stopped were not on the same trac as normal. being that they were so high it would be hard to say what they were. the strange  thing was that they stopped and looked to be at the same altitude.  i took a picture  but i only got star light so it of no help sorry. a video would not have worked ether due to altitude. it seems like sighting are becoming more frequent.  i have seen more in the last 3 mo. than ever. i was in ems from 1987 to 2004 i also drove a truck for 6 years i have see a lot of things i can't  explain over the years. that's it for now. if i can help more please contact  me. thanks.
content.summary: I think 5 were satellites vary high altitude. 2 i don't know the two stop right over head for about 1 orv2 minutes they were vary high probability out of our atmosphere. one was going north to south the other was going south to north they seen to be

content.detailedDescription:
this ufo event happened in plant city, fl. at 8:25pm. we where coming home from the store in our minivan. i was driving, my wife was front passenger, my daughter was rear middle seat passenger. we turned onto our block heading north. then with seconds, at about 1,500 before out house, i observed in the sky directly to the north of us, at about 45 degrees, a very bright amber light, with a tint of red in it. the light was not bothersome my eyes, and was very beautiful to look it. it was in the sky moving from west to east, at about 80 mph estimated. i noticed right away it was not a normal aircraft that i have ever scene. it had no blinking lights (standard aviation safety). it was close enough that i was able to know if safety lights where present. i pointed out the light to my wife, and we slowed down. i, my wife and daughter, all leaned forward trying to observe the object, all the while i was trying to watch the road at the same time. 
 
 as the lighted object was then blocked by a tree, i speed up a little to get to our drive way quicker, at which time during some visual breaks in other trees we started to pass by, the lighted object maintained it's course and speed. we pulled in the drive way, park the car fast, and we all got out, and swiftly moved about 15 feet away from the drivers side to further observe the lighted object in a clear area. there was no noise heard by any of us. further away in the eastern sky, the lighted object stopped briefly and hovered, it was easy to see it was motionless. then after about 15 seconds, it started moving again, continuing it's course east. again, no blinking lights, and a very bright amber color with a tint of red blended. after a few minutes, after getting further away, to the point of it being visually the size of a pin head, it disappeared. 

 my wife and i kept mentioning to each other how we never saw anything like it before, and we agreed it was not any known aircraft to ether of us. and it was not a meteor due to it's slow speed and not tale. 

 now keep in mind, that through the day time hours, and sometimes through the night, aircraft do pass over, both small and large military and civilian aircraft. even with the known aircraft we often see through the days, we can always tell it is man made no matter how far up in the sky they are. all the man made aircraft we notice, 9 times out of 10 fly from south to north, or north to south, never west to east. and we can always here any sounds from a propeller or jet aircraft, no matter how high they fly because the sounds easily echo down to us. again the craft made no noise, and that was very unusual because is 55 degrees and sound carries loader and further in the cold. 

to give you a better understanding of what we observed, since we had no camera's available at the time, i did google "amber light in the night sky", and copied it to give you a close example of what it look like. it is attached. 

anyways, that's all there is to it. i let my wife know i was going to report it to mufon, and there ya go. 

~thanks
[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Bright amber light, from w. to e. slow, no blinking, not a known aircraft

content.detailedDescription: While walking the dog, these lights were observed below cloud level hovering above malmstrom afb. two jets took off from great falls international airport and flew off in the direction of the lights. the air national guard operates from the airport.
content.summary: I am posting this for my father whom witnessed the event with my sister and nephew.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
The woman woke up in early morning around 4 a.M.  she witnessed a light between her blinds and decided to check it out because she is fond of the moon.

upon taking a closer look at the light through the blinds, she realized that the shape is entirely wrong and lacking in significant detail as the surface of the moon typically would.

the object appeared to be glowing yellow and white with red light near its tips. she is unable to describe the shape in any simple manner.  it was stationary and appeared to be floating high in the sky.  she was not able to determine any distance or specific size, but it must have been close to the typical size of the moon.

upon recognizing the object as potentially anomalous, the woman decided to take 5 pictures of the object with her cell phone through the window.  there is a visible house in the images. the images are all taken through the screening of the window, which interferes in the quality of the images.  one of the pictures appears to be distorted by motion of the photographer.

upon taking the images, she decided to return to sleep.  upon waking, there was no object or anything to indicate the nature of the object.
content.summary: Unknown glowing light initially mistaken for the moon in early morning by maryland woman.
